name: Discount Concerto
description:
**For best experience play the windows version -the html 5 version is a bit laggy. **

Henry found a coupon on the ground for 50 cents off a cheeseburger. This was created for the bullet hell jam in  a little over 4 days....i'm very tired.  

Gameplay changes approximately every 10 seconds.   Player is also granted 10 seconds of invulnerability when hit.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Art, music and programming by me (chase of bass)

Used one asset for counting rhythm.

Created using GMS 2

*has a small amount of blood on the game over screen
